words.definition: A way of pronouncing words typical of a certain area.
words.example: He has a strong British accent.

words.definition: A person whose job is to cut men’s hair.
words.example: I went to the barber to get a haircut.

words.definition: The part of a building that is below the ground.
words.example: We keep our old clothes in the basement.

words.definition: When something has nothing on it.
words.example: I need a blank piece of paper.

words.definition: To close and open your eyes quickly.
words.example: The bright light made me blink.

words.definition: A group of people who sing together.
words.example: She sings in the church choir.

words.definition: When something is funny.
words.example: The movie was very comic and made me laugh.

words.definition: To make it more difficult.
words.example: I don’t want to complicate the situation.

words.definition: To say no or to decrease.
words.example: She declined the offer to go to dinner.

words.definition: A short trip to do something.
words.example: I have to run some errands this afternoon.

words.definition: Clothing that covers your hand.
words.example: He wore gloves to keep his hands warm.

words.definition: A person who lives alone and far away from others.
words.example: The hermit lived in a small cabin.

words.definition: When something is done in a fair way.
words.example: The judge treated the prisoner justly.

words.definition: Material made from the skin of an animal.
words.example: He wore a leather jacket.

words.definition: To think carefully about something.
words.example: I pondered the question for a long time.

words.definition: To keep it for a particular person.
words.example: I reserved a table at the restaurant.

words.definition: The written words of a play or movie.
words.example: The actors studied their scripts.

words.definition: To look carefully for something.
words.example: I searched for my keys everywhere.

words.definition: To close it with a lot of force.
words.example: He slammed the door when he left.

words.definition: A set of stairs inside a building.
words.example: The staircase led to the second floor.
